name: FetchAuthorizedConnectApp
description: Fetch an instance of an authorized-connect-app

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the AuthorizedConnectApp resource to fetch.

ConnectAppSid.description: The SID of the Connect App to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the AuthorizedConnectApp resource.
**connect_app_company_name**: The company name set for the Connect App.
**connect_app_description**: A detailed description of the Connect App.
**connect_app_friendly_name**: The name of the Connect App.
**connect_app_homepage_url**: The public URL for the Connect App.
**connect_app_sid**: The SID that we assigned to the Connect App.
**permissions**: The set of permissions that you authorized for the Connect App.  Can be: `get-all` or `post-all`.
**uri**: The URI of the resource, relative to `https://api.twilio.com`.
